subject: UGC That Visually Hooks Viewers Instantly!
description_text:
Hi Simsonn Team,


I hope you're having a fantastic week!


People scroll fast—if content doesn’t grab them in the first second, it’s
gone. That’s why I create UGC for brands that stops the scroll and keeps
viewers engaged.


I’m Daniel <https://daniellaiugc.com/>, as a UGC creator and skilled video
editor, I craft content with dynamic visual hook edits, trending effects
and engaging transitions that make sure audiences stay hooked. My
experience in creating content for digital products, interactive
experiences and entertainment allows me to bring energy and excitement to
videos while keeping them genuine, engaging and user-focused.


I’ve worked with brands like Vinted to create engaging, high-performing UGC
that captures attention and feels organic.


If Simsonn is looking for content that authentically engages users and
showcases your product in a compelling way, I’d love to explore how we can
collaborate. Let’s set up a time to chat!


Best,
Daniel Lai
Portfolio <https://daniellaiugc.com/>

Tik Tok <https://www.tiktok.com/@daniellaiugc>
<https://daniellaiugc.com/>Instagram
<https://www.instagram.com/daniellaiugc/>

conversations.body_text: Hi，Daniel Lai，  在与您联系之前，我们的运营团队将审核您的 Instagram 个人资料。
